quote: Engage in those actions and thoughts that nurture the good qualities you want to have. – Paramahansa Yogananda
fact: For some time Frederic Chopin, the composer and pianist, wore a beard on only one side of his face, explaining: "It does not matter, my audience sees only my right side."
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: "I'll call you later." Don't call me later, call me Dad.
